hangle: 아직 헤일론에서 추가로 도착한 소식은 없나?
first_translate: has there been any news from hairoun recently?

hangle: 예, 그래서 헤일론으로 향할 채비는 예정대로 진행하고 있습니다.
first_translate: no, your highness.  that’s why we’re preparing for our trip as planned.
I see...

hangle: 앞으로도 다른 소식이 있다면 내 쪽으로 먼저 알릴 수 있도록 해.
first_translate: if anything else comes up, let me know first.
fiona will probably call me cowardly if she finds out about this,
but I have no choice.
even getting her to agree on three days of preparation time was difficult enough.

hangle: 다음 날 바로 떠나겠다는 것을 겨우 설득해서 얻었으니까.
first_translate: she wanted us to leave right away.

hangle: 제대로 된 준비도 없이 급히 내려보낼 뻔했지.
first_translate: had things gone according to plan, we would’ve left without making proper preparations.
do you think she has decided which servants are coming along yet?

hangle: 내내 아벨과 내 문제로 혼란스러워 하던데.
first_translate: she seemed quite confused because of what happened between abel and myself.

hangle: 정말 날 두고 갈 생각이라면 어떻게 해야 할까.
first_translate: what am I supposed to do if she decides not to take me with her?
then I’ll just make my own decision.
it’s not like I’m going to sit back and wait for her answer.
(bad idea.)

hangle: 다른 경우는 몰라도 이번에는 정말 양보할 수 없다.
first_translate: this is one thing I can’t compromise on.
or maybe I could try begging her--
mm...
siegren...?
fiona, how are you feeling now?
did something happen while I was asleep?
siegren...
was flirting around with other ladies...

hangle: 말도 안 되는 소리 하지 말고.
first_translate: stop saying such nonsense.

hangle: 너무 얄미워서 입 맞추고 싶은 수준이네….
first_translate: that makes me want to kiss him even more...
last night, you told me to be nice to them.
if you don’t like it, then I won’t do it next time.
uh-huh...
now that he knows I saw him,
fiona,
who did you meet at the banquet hall last night?
oh...
the person who sent me those strange love letters before...
love letters?
it doesn’t matter anymore.
pretend to sleep...
oops...
when someone asks me questions they already know the answers to,
my habit is to brush off their concerns by telling them “it’s fine.”
I thought I’d gotten over that habit by now.

hangle: 그래도 보통 때보다 판단력이 떨어지긴 했어.
first_translate: still, my judgment isn’t very good today.
let’s gently coax her into talking.
talk to me, fiona.
what happened yesterday?
and tell me about these love letters too.
yesterday...
I met the man who wrote all those weird love letters...
what was his name?
um...
bill curtis...
these are the documents you requested earlier, miss fiona.

hangle: 아주 급한 것들은 아니니까, 적당히 정리만 부탁해요.
first_translate: they aren’t urgent matters, but please look through them when you get some free time.

hangle: 예, 아가씨. 그런데, 정말 이대로 가셔도 괜찮으시겠습니까?
first_translate: of course, miss fiona. however, are you really okay leaving like this?
you seem unwell...

hangle: 괜찮아요, 어제 파티에서부터 감기 기운이 조금 있어서요.
first_translate: I’m alright. I must’ve come down with a cold after attending the party last night.

hangle: 내가 두 번 다시 술을 마시면 개다, 진짜….
first_translate: I swear I’m never drinking alcohol ever again...
not only does my memory keep skipping here and there,
celine helps fiona change clothes

hangle: 술기운에 시그렌에게 전부 말해버린 것 같은데…
first_translate: but I also spilled everything to siegren under the influence of liquor...

hangle: 애인이 미인계 좀 썼다고, 술술 부는 꼬락서니라니…
first_translate: how dare he use beauty tactics against me?! look at you spilling everything so easily...

hangle: 아니, 하지만 그렇게 웃으면서 살살 달래는 건 반칙이지…!
first_translate: wait, but wasn’t it unfair of him to smile and sweet-talk me like that?!
fiona.
we were originally planning to depart tonight.
is it alright if we leave early instead?
ah, siegren. you came quickly.

hangle: 아무래도 더 지체할 수는 없을 것 같아서
first_translate: as far as I can tell, we shouldn’t delay our departure any longer.
so once everyone finishes packing, we’ll head out immediately.
but you still don’t look well.
do you remember what happened last night?
of course I do...!
using beauty tricks on a drunk lady...

hangle: 하여간, 미인계에 넘어가다니 헤일론 후계자로 아직 부족하네.
first_translate: in any case, falling prey to such schemes proves that you’re not ready to become the successor of house hairoun.

hangle: 그게 지금 이 시점에서 할 말이야?
first_translate: is that really what you should say right now?
hmm...
why did I end up having to go to hairoun anyway?

hangle: 그래서, 가져간 정보는 어떻게 처리하셨나요, 전하?
first_translate: so, what did you decide to do with the information I gave you, your highness?

hangle: 내가 과연 어떻게 처리했을 것 같아?
first_translate: what do you think I did with it?

hangle: 응? 무려 연애편지를 몰래 숨기고 있던 아가씨.
first_translate: huh? especially since you secretly hid those love letters from me.
he’s definitely sulking, sulking!
please tell me you didn’t kill anyone...

hangle: 아니야, 빌 커티스란 남자에 대해 조사 중이지.
first_translate: no, I’m investigating this guy named bill curtis.

hangle: 아무리 보아도 영 뒤가 구린 인간이더군.
first_translate: from what I found, he seems suspicious.
good...

hangle: 그렇지 않아도 그가 마물에 관해 이상한 말을 했다는 게 마음에 걸렸거든.
first_translate: to be honest, I felt uneasy when he mentioned monsters.

hangle: …요즘 네가 좀 달라진 것 같아서 걱정이야.
first_translate: lately, I feel like you’ve changed somewhat.
you became much more serious toward others.
I understand that part of it may be due to abel confusing you,

hangle: 예전에는 이렇게 변했으면 좋겠다고 생각한 적도 있는데…
first_translate: but although I used to wish you’d act like this in the past,

hangle: 막상 네가 일희일비하니 별로인 것 같기도 하고.
first_translate: now that you actually are, I find it rather unpleasant.
that’s why I worry about you.
fiona, you need me.
at least, that’s what I believe.
remember what you said about choosing the best option?
don’t you think it’s time you made a conclusion?

hangle: 적어도 지금 곁에 붙어 계신 황자 전하보다
first_translate: I’m certain I’ll prove to be more useful than the prince standing beside you right now.

hangle: 분명 제가 훨씬 가치 있을 테니까요.
first_translate: I’m certain I’ll prove to be more useful than the prince standing beside you right now.
did I...

hangle: 네게도 같은 이야기를 하게 만든 걸까?
first_translate: ...make you say the same thing to yourself?
with your presence alone, you’ll help not only me,
but many people living there as well.

hangle: 최선의 선택 중에서 널 두고 간다는 선택지는
first_translate: leaving you behind was never an option among the choices available.
leaving you behind was never an option among the choices available.
but I hoped that reason wouldn’t be...

hangle: 네가 이 일에 '필요'하기 때문은 아니었으면 했어.
first_translate: ...because you needed me.

hangle: 이런 마음으로 시그렌과 함께하려는 게 아니었는데.
first_translate: this wasn’t how I intended to stay together with siegren.

hangle: …너와 함께하고 싶은 다른 이유를 생각해 보려고 했어.
first_translate: I tried thinking of another reason why I wanted to be with you...

hangle: 빌 커티스의 그 말이 더 거슬렸던 건.
first_translate: 106bill curtis’ words bothered me greatly.

hangle: 그걸 인정하고 싶지 않아서 였을지도 몰라.
first_translate: perhaps it was because I refused to acknowledge them.
fiona,

hangle: 그럼 나는 네게 옆에 있고 싶지만 필요는 없는 사람이야?
first_translate: does that mean I’m someone you want to be with, though you don’t necessarily need me?
n-no, that’s not what I meant...!
oh...
needing someone...
why do you consider that bad?

hangle: 나도 네가 내 곁에 필요해. 피오나.
first_translate: I need you by my side too, fiona.
just like abel needs you right now.
and besides...

hangle: 애초에 선택지 중에 나를 두고 가는 게 없었다면…
first_translate: if leaving me behind was never an option,
that means we’re heading there together, correct?
I got caught up in it again...

hangle: 취하지도 않았는데 왜 이렇게 되는 거야…
first_translate: why does this always happen even when I'm sober...?
rather than using beauty tactics, it feels like he’s forcing himself onto me...
gunter...
gunter was there.

hangle: 권터가 나중에 의뢰하면 뭐든 다 들어주겠다고…!
first_translate: he promised to grant whatever request I had later on...!
let’s hurry and go find him, siegren!
